ProductsDetail.Description:
Weak, damaged nails are no match for Nail Envy Bubble Bath our maximum nail Strengthener with staying power. Strengthening natural nails with hydrolysed, wheat protein & calcium, this offers all the nail rehabbing benefits of Nail Envy.

Now available in three favourite OPI classic shades to add a tint of colour to your nails whilst strengthening them.

Love this tint of nude pink nail polish ? Try the entire Nail Envy range.
ProductsDetail.Field2:
Apply two coats of this nail strengthener to your bare nail and then apply one coat every other day to maintain your treatment. For a streak free finish, we recommend shaking the bottle before use.

After one week, use any OPI Polish Remover to remove all Nail Envy and Nail Lacquer, if present.

You can even add a coat of this nail polish over regular lacquer, so there’s no excuse for not getting nails to envy!

attributeValues.childProductDescription:

Designed to infuse strength, health and vitality into weak, thin and soft nails, this high-performance nail treatment delivers long lasting results.


Strength is beauty and OPI delivers strength with its range of Nail Envy natural nail strengtheners. OPI has developed a different formula to meet your individual needs.

ProductsDetail.Description: Rapidry Top Coat offers quick drying protection for your nails. Perfect for use over coloured nail polishes or as a clear coat over natural nails.
ProductsDetail.Field2: Once your lacquer is dry apply to ensure a tough, long-lasting, non-yellowing, high-gloss shine.

Optimum sticking power

ProductsDetail.Description: With a high-performance formula and long-lasting results, OPI Top Coat is a manicure essential for a high gloss finish. This top coat nail polish prevents smudges.
ProductsDetail.Field2: Once your nail lacquer is completely dry, apply OPI Top Coat to prevent smudges and help ensure a chip free manicure. For ultimate results use OPI Base Coat, followed by two coats of nail lacquer before application.

ProductsDetail.ProductName: It's a Boy! - OPI Infinite Shine Nail Polish
ProductsDetail.Description:
"

  • Pastel blue isn't just for baby boys.

  • This soft light blue nail polish shade is so pretty the stork delivered it himself.

  • OPI's Infinite Shine is a three-step long lasting nail polish line that provides gel-like high shine and 11 days of wear.

  • Use with Infinite Shine Primer and Infinite Shine Gloss for extended wear.

  • Made in the USA.
ProductsDetail.Field2:
1. Properly prep your natural nail for long lasting nail polish to ensure lacquer adhesion.

  2. Apply one coat of Infinite Shine Primer.

  3. Shake long lasting nail polish shade of choice before application to properly mix pigment (this will help avoid streakiness!).

  4. Apply two thin coats of Infinite Shine to each nail. Brush some polish at the nail's free edge to cap the nails and help prevent chipping.

  5. Lastly, apply one coat of Infinite Shine Gloss. Also cap the free edge with Infinite Shine Gloss.
